name: Marcus Okafor
bio: Marcus Okafor is a journalist and activist based in Detroit. He covers labor organizing, racial capitalism, and the politics of deindustrialization. He is a former UAW organizer and holds an MA in American Studies from Wayne State University.
title: Labor Correspondent

name: Sidoc Haytu
bio: Sidoc Haytu is a political theorist specializing in Marxism and the cultural politics of race and gender. He is the author of several essays on care work, wages, and the gendered division of labor.
title: Political Theorist
